title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: New: AWS Lambda tenant isolation | Serverless Office Hours

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this Serverless Office Hours episode demos AWS Lambda's new tenant isolation mode, which gives each tenant a dedicated execution environment to keep cached data and execution contexts siloed. The hosts explain how this reduces infrastructure complexity, preserves strong isolation during traffic spikes, and includes automatic tenant identifier logging for easier debugging.
bullets: Tenant isolation mode provides dedicated execution environments per tenant to prevent cross-tenant data exposure.
Cached data and execution contexts are siloed for stronger security boundaries.
Feature reduces infrastructure complexity while enabling faster scaling during traffic spikes.
Built-in monitoring automatically logs tenant identifiers to simplify tenant-specific debugging.
Session hosted by Julian Wood with guests Anton Aleksandrov and Ayush Kulkarni.
takeaways: Enable tenant isolation to strengthen security guarantees for multi-tenant SaaS on Lambda.
Reduce operational complexity by relying on built-in isolation instead of custom infrastructure per tenant.
Improve resilience to traffic spikes with faster scaling while maintaining tenant separation.
Simplify incident investigation and tenant-level debugging via automatic tenant identifier logging.

Total net worth reported at approximately $6 million.

items.title: How I Built A $1M/Year Business - And Helped My Parents Retire

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Tuan Le emigrated from Vietnam to Toronto in 2015 and vowed at 15 to help his parents retire. Ten years later his social video production company, ShortsCut, is generating over $1 million USD a year in sales, and he now covers his parents' rent and living expenses so they no longer work full time.
bullets: Tuan Le emigrated from Vietnam to Toronto in 2015 and made a personal vow at age 15 to support his parents' retirement.
He founded ShortsCut, a social video production company.
ShortsCut now brings in over $1 million USD per year in sales.
Le uses company earnings to pay his parents' rent and living expenses so they can stop working full time.
takeaways: A social video production company reaching seven-figure revenue suggests creative media firms can be stable, paying customers for digital infrastructure.
Growth of video-focused businesses may increase demand for reliable hosting, storage and bandwidth capacity from service providers.
Data center operators should consider the needs of small-to-midsize media producers when assessing customer segments and capacity planning.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description, a giant bubble of carbon dioxide can store 20 megawatts of energy. The description says these CO2-based batteries are designed to address fluctuating renewable supplies and to help power the global shift to clean energy.
bullets: Giant bubble of carbon dioxide used as an energy storage medium
Stores 20 megawatts of energy
Aims to address fluctuations in renewable energy supply
Positioned to support a global transition to clean energy
takeaways: 20 MW storage capacity indicates potential utility-scale support for balancing supply and demand
Can help smooth renewable variability, reducing the need for fossil-fuel backup during dips
Worth monitoring or piloting as part of capacity planning and resilience strategies
Consider evaluating integration and interconnection requirements for this novel storage approach

items.title: Figure Skating | Making Team USA presented by Xfinity with Apolo Ohno

ai.summary: Based on the available description, figure skating duo Vadym Kolesnik and Emilia Zingas sit down with Apolo Ohno on this week's episode of Making Team USA presented by Xfinity ahead of the Winter Olympics. The episode emphasizes the pair's partnership, summarized by the phrase "Built on trust."
bullets: Interview features pair skaters Vadym Kolesnik and Emilia Zingas with host Apolo Ohno.
Episode is part of Making Team USA presented by Xfinity and timed ahead of the Winter Olympics.
Theme highlighted: "Built on trust"—focusing on partnership and coordination.
Published by Team USA with links to subscribe and follow across their social channels.
takeaways: Trust and strong partnerships are critical for high-stakes, time-sensitive operations—relevant to coordinating grid and data center teams.
Reliable collaboration and clear roles reduce risk during peak events or outages—invest in team drills and cross-team rehearsals.
Maintain clear external communication and branding to keep stakeholders informed during major deployments or incidents.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych – jak wykorzystać jej potencjał? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description… The KPMG ON AIR podcast episode explains how AI is changing transfer pricing practices — from monitoring profitability and comparative analyses to automating documentation — while arguing that AI will augment rather than replace tax advisors. The discussion also covers implementation steps, integration with ERP and intelligent benchmarks, and risks such as data security, RODO and hallucinations, with mention of secure environments like Digital Gateway.
bullets: AI applications: monitoring rentowności, analizy porównawcze i automatyzacja dokumentacji cen transferowych.
AI wspiera, nie zastępuje, doradców podatkowych i może przyspieszyć rozwój kompetencji młodszych pracowników.
Ryzyka: dane, bezpieczeństwo, RODO oraz ryzyko „halucynacji” modeli AI.
Bezpieczne środowiska (Digital Gateway) i integracja z ERP jako ważne elementy wdrożenia.
Wdrożenie: zacząć od uporządkowania procesów i określenia pierwszych kroków transformacji.
takeaways: Zadbaj o porządek i jakość danych — uporządkowane procesy to fundament skutecznego wdrożenia AI.
Priorytetem jest bezpieczeństwo i zgodność z RODO przy pracy z danymi używanymi przez modele AI.
Planuj integrację AI z istniejącymi systemami ERP oraz wykorzystanie inteligentnych benchmarków dla transfer pricingu.
Używaj bezpiecznych środowisk (np. Digital Gateway) do pracy z AI, aby ograniczyć ryzyka operacyjne i prawne.

takeaways: Maintaining momentum is valuable for long-running initiatives and operations; consider tools that help sustain progress.
For teams managing ongoing projects or routines, tooling that promotes continuous forward motion can reduce stalls and friction.
Evaluate solutions like Copilot for their potential to support persistent, incremental progress across recurring tasks.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video highlights how the Dell PowerEdge R770AP server, powered by Intel® Xeon® 6 processors, delivers the precision and speed required for high-frequency trading. It notes that these systems help maximize gains and minimize losses by executing hundreds of trades in seconds and positions Intel Xeon 6 CPUs as shaping the future of finance.

Promotes Intel Business as a resource for IT and data center guidance.
takeaways: Consider investing in low-latency server platforms (e.g., Dell PowerEdge R770AP) for HFT workloads.
Intel® Xeon® 6 processors are presented as a performance option for finance-focused compute needs.
Infrastructure choices that prioritize speed and precision can support high transaction volumes (hundreds of trades in seconds).
